property.name: poolType
property.formula: (SELECT items.itemtype FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = netid)

property.name: previousType
property.formula: (SELECT items.itemtype FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = previous)

property.name: poolName
property.formula: (SELECT items.name FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = netid)

property.name: previousName
property.formula: (SELECT items.name FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = previous)

property.name: poolUuid
property.formula: (SELECT items.uuid FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = netid)

property.name: previousUuid
property.formula: (SELECT items.uuid FROM cmdb_storage_items items WHERE items.id = previous)
